plot: Captain Star, and his crew, Navigator Black, Atomic Engine Stoker "Limbs" Jones, and first officer Scarlette are on an uncharted planet at the ragged edge of the universe, awaiting further orders from mission control.
plot_en: Captain Star, and his crew, Navigator Black, Atomic Engine Stoker "Limbs" Jones, and first officer Scarlette are on an uncharted planet at the ragged edge of the universe, awaiting further orders from mission control.
plot_es: Captain Star, and his crew, Navigator Black, Atomic Engine Stoker "Limbs" Jones, and first officer Scarlette are on an uncharted planet at the ragged edge of the universe, awaiting further orders from mission control.
title: Captain Star
